CHAT.comment: MARY BERGHUIS, WARDEN, Petitioner v. DIAPOLIS SMITH.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:14 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF B. ERIC RESTUCCIA ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES STERLING LAWRENCE ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF B. ERIC RESTUCCIA, ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:14 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
